articles.author: Mary Kay Linge
articles.title: Joe Biden fumbled a century's worth of coronation precedent by sending Jill Biden in his stead: historian - New York Post
articles.description: President Biden is continuing a long American tradition by skipping the coronation of King Charles III — but broke more than 100 years of precedent by choosing wife Jill as his stand-in, one …
articles.content: President Biden continued a long American tradition by skipping the coronation of King Charles III — but by choosing Jill Biden as his stand-in, he broke sharply with more than a century of precedent… [+3147 chars]
